title: When to start ranked?
body:
I casually play lol, generally as a support (braum) or jungle role (amumu, voli). I do relatively well, probably around  65%-70% win rate on said champions. I wish to play ranked to better my skills, but i only have 166 normal wins in total playing league. I want to enter ranked in a state where i wont be completely thrashed due to inexperience. 

When is the optimal time to enter ranked? A certain amount of champs and rune pages? Or just head straight into it and see what happens?
